summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Business Details Modal feature for FINMAR pricing page. All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly.

design_issues.note: Accessibility improvement - add aria-describedby to modal

passed_tests: ✅ Business Details Modal appears when clicking 'Subscribe Now' button after selecting a plan
✅ All required fields present in modal: Business Name, ABN, Industry dropdown, Phone Number
✅ Form validation prevents submission with empty required fields (shows toast error)
✅ Backend endpoint PUT /api/profile/business saves business details correctly
✅ After form submission, user is redirected to Stripe checkout
✅ Pre-fill functionality works - existing user data populates the form fields
✅ Cancel button closes the modal correctly
✅ All 12 industry options are valid and accepted by backend
✅ Business details persist and can be retrieved via GET /api/profile
✅ Authentication required for business details endpoint (401 without auth)
✅ All package endpoints working (combined, accounting, marketing, addons)
✅ Checkout session creation works after saving business details

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All UI tests passed - modal, form fields, validation, pre-fill, checkout redirect)

test_user.note: User has pre-filled business details for testing

seed_data_creation: Created test user test_business@example.com with business details for pre-fill testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Business Details Modal feature is fully implemented and tested. The modal appears on pricing page when authenticated user clicks 'Subscribe Now'. All 4 required fields (Business Name, ABN, Industry, Phone) work correctly with validation. Pre-fill from user profile works. Form submission saves to backend and redirects to Stripe checkout. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_business_details.py can be reused for regression testing.

feature_verification_summary.Business Details Modal appears: PASS - Modal opens when clicking Subscribe Now after selecting a plan
feature_verification_summary.Required fields present: PASS - Business Name, ABN, Industry dropdown, Phone Number all present with asterisk indicators
feature_verification_summary.Form validation: PASS - Empty form submission shows toast error 'Please fill in all required fields'
feature_verification_summary.Backend endpoint: PASS - PUT /api/profile/business saves all fields correctly (tested with 22 pytest cases)
feature_verification_summary.Stripe checkout redirect: PASS - After form submission, redirects to Stripe checkout URL
feature_verification_summary.Pre-fill functionality: PASS - Existing user data (business_name, abn, industry, phone) populates form fields
